Date: Monday, 4/21/1986
Subject: Wilson Corrales failed learning new position
Wilson Corrales doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Progress of Davis Birch
Dear Sir,
Davis Birch is hitting the ball well at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .327, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of Raul Fraile
Dear Sir,
Raul Fraile has problems at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an ERA of 5.40, so you might
want to demote him soon, before his attitude suffers!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1986
Subject: Status of James Webb
Dear Sir,
James Webb has an AVG of .200 at AA Springfield Duff!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/4/1986
Subject: Progress of Andre Brock
Dear Sir,
Andre Brock has nothing more to prove at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .275 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/8/1986
Subject: Status of Freddy Lozano
Dear Sir,
Freddy Lozano isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Springfield Duff!
He has an AVG of .246, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director
